title: Socket-outlets
fullText:
A fixed socket-outlet shall be provided for each item of medical electrical equipment being used.
All fixed and portable socket-outlets protected by an LPD that are to be used to supply medical electrical equipment shall be identified 'SUITABLE FOR MEDICAL USE'.
Socket-outlets other than those installed for the supply of medical electrical equipment do not require LPD protection, shall be protected by an RCD having a rated residual current not exceeding 30 mA, installed in accordance with AS/NZS 3000.
